# IntentWidgetFamily.accessoryCircular

**Case**

A circular widget.

## Declaration

```swift
case accessoryCircular
```

## Discussion

The accessory circular widget can appear as a complication in watchOS, or on the Lock Screen in iOS.
title: IntentWidgetFamily.accessoryCircular
